entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
